reviews.review_text: There was only 4 in each bag instead of 5-6 and a couple were damaged, has cuts into them where they had been hit up against something hard so black on the inside.

reviews.title: over ripe avocados
reviews.review_text: I ordered 2 bags of small avocados. Both bags had mushy avocados in them. I buy these al the time, and they are always hard and need to ripen on the counter.

reviews.title: No one needs leftover avocado
reviews.review_text: These are sized perfectly for one or two people. I let them ripen on the counter and then put them in the refrigerator where the avocado stay fresh for several days at the perfect ripeness.

These bagged avocados are just the right size to spread on 40 calorie bread ( toast. ) They do tend to turn color and get stringy if not kept in refrigerator. They are best used within 3 days of purchase.

reviews.title: Know how to test for ripe avavacodos
reviews.review_text: Every avacado was hard as a rock. 7 days later, they are still hard. I have my groceries delivered, so I can't say that my shopper knew what to look for when choosing . if you plan to use them right away, you might talk to your shopper.

reviews.title: Too small and bruised
reviews.review_text: Very Small and they were not ripe when they arrived but were bruised! I tried to use several but because they were so small and were damaged, it was difficult. I would not recommend.

reviews.title: Avocados in a bag
reviews.review_text: The avocados were perfect for my dish I made today. I used two and was able to use the other three in 4 other dishes I made. Excellent quality and taste.
The avocado's that I receive from Walmart, are not ripe yet.So I let them sit out for about 3 days, %26 they ripen beautifully. Then I can eat them whenever %26 refrigerate.

reviews.title: Short
reviews.review_text: The product information clearly says 5 to 6 avocados. I've ordered them twice now and they're only four in the bag every time please make a correction.

reviews.title: Bad avocados
reviews.review_text: Everyone of these avocados was bad. They have been getting worse and worse. The two bags I got before this one about half of them were bad. I recommend choosing the individual avocados

reviews.title: Small Hass perfect
reviews.review_text: The recent bag I received was only three avocados and they were large, which is not what I ordered. I like the 6 small. I ordered small hass avocados, which comes with six count
I love avocados these ones when open to used they not healthy I have to throw a lot in the garbage I can show pictures already are two of good ones and others are in garbage

reviews.title: Usually perfect.
reviews.review_text: I received six avocados. Five ripened and were delicious, but one was stayed hard and wouldn't ripen. The small size is perfect for a person living alone. Thanks for offering it.

reviews.title: Rotten Avocado
reviews.review_text: Usually really good. This time one was black inside. They were all a little too ripe given the fact that there's about a 5 minute perfect ripeness for avocados. Much better if they come unripe.

reviews.title: YAY
reviews.review_text: Great %26 economical way to have avos on hand. They r small, so one can be enjoyed without the darkening problem, no leftovers most times. So good for us, %26 versatile too !

reviews.title: Right size for one-each serving
reviews.review_text: Smaller size nice for one per person. It's best to get them green, put half in the fridge. Then wrap the rest in brown paper, and store in a bread box at room temp; checking daily on their ripening progress.

reviews.title: Sad Batch of Avocados
reviews.review_text: The last 4-5 deliveries of avocados have been awful! Never ripen, just spoil. Stay hard and turn brown and dried out from the inside. brown fibers grow before the fruit can ripen. they must not have been picked at the correct time etc.

reviews.title: Awful avocados
reviews.review_text: These avocados were all rotten on the inside. I was able to get one small bite size piece from one. That piece had no flavor and watery. These were a waste of money. I will not buy again. Please stop carrying avocados from Columbia.

reviews.title: I eat at least one or two a day!
reviews.review_text: they always come fresh and take a couple days of ripen. I buy multiple at a time and I keep the ones I'm not eating in the fridge until I'm ready for them to start ripping.

These were delivered to my car at a Walmart location. They never ripened after a week and stayed hardened. When I took a bite, they were hard and rubbery. I threw out the rest of the lot. Not good. What a waste.

I usually order this item.the product used to come from Mexico,but now these avacados are sourced from Columbia.They take forever to ripen and they don't taste as good.Same packageing but now they come from Columbia.

often get 2 to 3 avocados with dark "veins' in them or a dark/bruised area so I can eat o ly about half of a whole avocado. the most tecent order had the avocados had the same dark "veins" and had a watery texture.
All the avocados were bad i threw them away there was no refund link to this item it is not the first time this has happened between missing items and spoiled very disappointing
they were hard and did not ripen properly. i let them ripen a couple of days. stayed hard in spots. i had to throw parts of them away. i used them anyway.
i was not sure about getting these avacados delivered. the ones i hand-picked latley were over-ripe and bruised. but these were all perfect! i was so happy!

reviews.title: Great Avocados
reviews.review_text: This bag of avocados never fails. I order this frequently and they are always fresh. Sometimes they are hard when they arrive but after a few days they soften up and I put in the fridge!
Avocados from Colombia is worst avocados They never ripped well. I have tried a couple of times but not good. I only buy if they are from Mexico. They are always ripe well.

reviews.title: Bad batch
reviews.review_text: I buy these often, but this last bag was full of black spots and stringy pieces. And no I didn't let them go bad; it was right after I bought them and they weren't even ripe. Only one was partially OK.

reviews.title: disgusting
reviews.review_text: very disgusting. when these were purchased the were green and hard. left out on a counter to ripen a few days and this is what i opened them up to find. 🤮

reviews.title: Healthy avocados
reviews.review_text: The size of each avocado is great…. Can eat the whole thing without putting it in fridge to discolor. Been buying them for almost a year and haven't been disappointed.

reviews.title: Green on outside, rotten in middle
reviews.review_text: These used to be good. Uneatable the last few times I ordered. How can they still be green, firm with a little squish, and then be rotten on the inside?

reviews.title: Don't buy these
reviews.review_text: Terrible product. More than 60% of them had to be thrown out. They were all bad on the inside once I waited for them to ripen. I should have asked for a refund.

reviews.title: Disappointed this time. But will try them again.
reviews.review_text: I get these in a regular basis. They're usually almost ripe and last about a week. this time they were very very ripe and didn't last that long. Also the price has increased significantly!!

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: Very poor quality. Opened them, and the insides were nearly white, with a small green tint. Lots of brown spots, one was completely black. I cut apart 5 avocados to get the amount of 1 avocado due to the amount of bad spots.

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.review_text: Terrible quality. This supplier delivers only bad avocados. All of them have roots growing inside and are completely rotten. They don't even ripen properly — it's just a waste. I don't recommend buying from this supplier.

reviews.title: Never know what you'll get
reviews.review_text: I wasn't impressed with these avocados. The first time I got them they were overly ripe. This time not near ripeness and a couple don't seem like they ever will.

reviews.title: Not. Good. At. All.
reviews.review_text: These never fully ripened. The inside near the seed stayed hard as a rock, while the upper part was ripe. I won't ever buy this brand again, perfect waste of money since I threw most of them away.

reviews.title: Like avocados? Skip Walmart.
reviews.review_text: I've purchased avocados from Walmart many times. The bag I purchased a few days ago was inedible. They went from hard as rocks to mush in 3 days. Cutting one open revealed flesh that was black and brown. The entire bag was discarded.
I ordered these a week ago, they've been on my counter since, and they're still green and rock hard. There is obviously something wrong with them that they won't ripen.

reviews.title: HUGE PROBLEM WITH YOUR AVACADOS!!!
reviews.review_text: I wouldn't even give it a one star, but they made me!! the avocados are usually good but the last 3 times I've bought them, they were all rotten!! They take over a week to start feeling soft, cut them open and they're all black and rotten!!
I have had this item before and was quite happy. This time the avocados went hard and not edible before I could use them all. Just a bad batch I guess.

reviews.title: Excellent when Fresh
reviews.review_text: The price on these are great and they are good for your health. However when you get fresh fruit and vegetables delivered sometimes they are over ripe on the same day they are delivered.

The last two times I ordered the avocados they were rotten! I ordered them again and so far only one was good?! The rest of the avocados still hard and it's been a week but I'm keeping them hoping that they will get firm enough to cut and eat.

reviews.title: Small avocados
reviews.review_text: These avocados are delicious and of great value if you choose them yourself, because unfortunately there are times when the home delivery items are rotten to the core. Sometimes half are good, and the rest are bad.
they were really small and didn't have much flesh or flavor. one of them I couldn't even cut it open I had to throw it in the trash. I think it was all seed.

reviews.title: Avocados
reviews.review_text: These are just the right size to use 1 on my 2 slices of toast in the morning. Sometimes I have to wait for them to ripen on the counter. When they soften up a little I put them in a small brown paper bag and put them in the refrigerator.

I didn't realize there were going to be super, super small. I am not going to be able to use them for at least 4 days because they are not even close to be ripe. I needed them for today. Definitely not worth 63 cents each.

reviews.title: Disgusting
reviews.review_text: I don't know if you need better shoppers for your delivery service, or produce managers who care, but getting a bag of rotted avocados is frustrating. It happens about every third time I buy them, so it's definitely an ongoing problem.

When I got them, avocados were hard as a rock after five days they soft just a little when opening them they were black inside I had to throw them out. Will never buy these again. Would like to get a refund.

I don't want to give an unfair review. I followed the instructions that were listed as to how to ripen the avocados. Unfortunately they became moldy and inedible. I do plan to plan to make another purchase soon .

reviews.title: Rubber avocados
reviews.review_text: Every one I cut into was like rubber inside. Huge pit. The meat was like rubber. Can't help but think this it product of the things that hates and others want on and in our food.

reviews.title: Yummy Small Avocados
reviews.review_text: I love avocados but have to watch fiber so I get the small ones to keep that in check. I like these because I can eat one at a time and it works for me. I love the buttery nutty flavor.

I couldn't rate any of the features of these avocados because they aren't ripe. And after 2 days they are barely starting to get just slightly soft. I will update as to whether or not they ripen before they rot.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: I bought this item many times, quality varies, sometimes no problem, other times have to throw them away. another thing, usually comes with five, but today and another time comes with less than five, only 3 or four.

reviews.title: bad avocados
reviews.review_text: I buy the avocados all the time and have never had a problem but this time they're too soft I'm going to have to call them and I hate having to go through the robot but I will

This is my favorite item I order I love to eat one of these every day. They're delicious today. There wasn't any that was ripe yet so far there has been one ripe for every day. Nice price nice that they're available.

If you have it delivered, check to make sure you got the right bag of avocados. I wasn't so lucky. Instead of getting the 5-6 per bag, as it says in the ad, I got 4 very small ones. My advice; don't buy them before you see them.

reviews.title: Uneven ripening
reviews.review_text: I've ordered these twice and both times the avocados have not ripened evenly.. Even after letting ripen on the counter, some of the flesh near the seed is still very hard.
These little hass avocados are the perfect size for 2 servings. They almost always ripen nicely and stay ripe in the fridge for a decent amount of time after.

reviews.title: Hit or miss with quality avocados but price is ok
reviews.review_text: Good competitive price, but sometimes the quality isn't the best. I get bruised or rotten avocados occasionally even when they look bright green at time of purchase. I have to return the bag sometimes and get another in place of the original one.

reviews.title: BAD PRODUCE
reviews.review_text: All the avocados were too ripe and ready to be eaten immediately or they're garbage. I'm not even sure if all them are edible...smh Who ever shopped my produce today needs to be retrained.
The ones I had sent were as hard as rocks. I had to wait a week for them to be usable to me. It ended up fine but picking something closer to usable would definitely be preferred.

reviews.title: Small Hass avocados
reviews.review_text: Once in awhile we need to wait a day or two for them to ripen which is not a problem compared to buying avocados that are already over the hill which was a problem where we used to get them. Real happy with the small ones in the little green sack.

reviews.title: You will be ROBBED
reviews.review_text: You will be robbed! I have ordered this product a couple of times. Small avocados 5 to 6 count. I have always received a 4 count. Did I receive the wrong product? I don't see an option for a 4 count. How to rectify this situation?

reviews.title: Bad purchase
reviews.review_text: I buy these every week and they are usually fine. This time they were very stiff but soft in spots and black inside. The entire bag was trash. Very disappointed.
Typically about half of these are brown inside or too stringy for guacamole, but I still buy them because I still get more avocado than I do buying the large single ones.

reviews.title: Not goid
reviews.review_text: Sadly, every single one was dark brown and stringy inside. This was the second time this happened. Seems like they may have been frozen previously. Anyway, probably won't order for delivery anymore.

reviews.title: Creamy %26 dreamy
reviews.review_text: I use to make guacamole to spread on my fresh sourdough bread. They all ripen in a day or two and make such a creamy, delicious treat. The price is great.

reviews.title: Bad Avacado
reviews.review_text: I was looking forward to making fresh Guacamole. Each avacado I cut into was black and dark green. These appeared fine on the outside but not on the inside at all. they were rotten.
worst avocados I've ever had. Never got soft at all, in fact I still have 2 that are hard weeks later. The few that I tried to eat had thick strings almost like wood in them. Very, very disappointed.

reviews.title: N a good buy anymore
reviews.review_text: The last two times I've ordered, the avocados have been mushy and no good. I'm not sure the associate knows how to pick them out. Not ordering anymore.
